lom:description.lom:string: Collection of Java applets designed to present a concept generally related to atmospheric science. The site is highly interactive to encourage discovery. Topics include satellite image interpretation, the formation of contrails, a hurricane model and solar radiation intensity as it varies with latitude and time of year.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Atmospheric science, Climatology, Space science, Weather
